rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {GAS2613, MAT2020, MTH2021%}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ENG1005, MTH1030, MTH1035}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MAT1841, MTH1030, MTH1035}
Unit was previously coded {GAS2613, MAT2020, MTH2021%}

description: Vector spaces, linear transformations. Determinants, eigenvalue problems. Inner products, symmetric matrices, quadratic forms. LU-decomposition, least squares approximation, power method. Applications to coding, economics, networks, graph theory, geometry, dynamical systems, Markov chains, differential equations.
